description: A TM2 file is an image used by a PlayStation 2 (PS2) or PlayStation Portable (PSP) video game. It contains a texture used to show or skin an in-game object. The games Final Fantasy XII, Spider-Man: The Movie, Sword Art Online: Infinity Moment, and many others used TM2 files.

instructions: You can open a TM2 file and view the image it contains in Rainbow (Windows), Noesis (Windows), or XnViewMP (multiplatform). Rainbow and Noesis are specialized programs used by video game modders, while XnViewMP is a standard image viewer.
